title: 紐約發電廠變壓器爆炸 天空突然「染藍」 又一個超級英雄誕生!

replies.msg:
美國紐約天際周四晚上9時許突然「染藍」，驟眼看與《天煞︰地球反擊戰》（Independence Day）外星人侵襲地球的畫面十分類似，許多市民都紛紛湧到街上觀看及拍攝這個奇景。但其實這個異象並非末日先兆，亦非外星人襲地球，其實只是位於皇后區的發電廠變壓器爆炸而已，「藍天」持續了大約3分鐘便消失。

由於發電廠變壓器爆炸，紐約部份地區停電，連鄰近曼哈頓的機場、已有76年歷史的拉瓜迪亞機場（LaGuardia Airport）亦受影響，航班停頓逾1小時後才恢復。另外著名的賴克斯島（Rikers Island）監獄亦停電25分鐘，要動用後備電力，地下鐵亦出現延誤。

發電廠變壓器爆炸未有造成傷亡，火勢亦迅速撲滅。而紐約警方亦展示幽默本色，聲稱並未外星人入侵地球。

https://hk.news.appledaily.com/international/realtime/article/20181228/59079026
其實咩原理

真係英雄片咁
=================
•New York skyline turned a bizarre blue on Thursday night after an electrical fault at a Con Edison plant
•Utility said Friday the fault produced what is known as electrical arc flash
•Electrical arc is a visible plasma discharge between two electrodes caused by electrical current ionizing gasses in the air

•The NYPD jokingly confirmed that aliens had not invaded, while others shared memes from sci-fi movies


Thunder and lightening: Con Edison said Friday that an electrical fault at its Queens plant caused what is known as an electrical arc, which turned the night sky a dazzling shade of blue Thursday




An electrical fault in equipment that carries 138,000 volts of electricity 20 feet up in the air produced the lightening-like phenomenon


Con Edison likened what happened on Thursday in Queens to a thunder and lightening event




The 43rd Precinct had a little fun with the news




Viewed from the Upper West Side of Manhattan








The bright blue light is seen on the rooftops over Queens on Thursday evening


Residents walked out onto the streets in Queens to catch a glimpse of the bizarre sky






Spectators were mesmerized by the bright flashes of blue that illuminated the cloudy night sky


Folks all the way out in Jersey City reported seeing the flashy lights
